text_block_list.name: Cafe Lady
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for waiting! Here you are! The<n>Special
Stamina Sanzoku Fried Chicken<n>Set with five
extra pieces and side of<n>ginger pork!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I find Narita Brian in the cafeteria with a<n>meal
resembling something out of a food<n>challenge.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Ah... I feel a bit off at the moment.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I've learned from experience that<n>whenever I'm
tired, meat's the way to go.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Once I eat meat, that usually fixes<n>whatever's
wrong.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if this wild form of self-care<n>really will
make her feel better.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: I may want to rethink her race<n>schedule...
